summary.description:
Macroepidemiological aspects of porcine reproductive and respiratory syndrome virus detection by major United States veterinary diagnostic laboratories over time, age group, and specimen.

The Swine Disease Reporting System (SDRS) consists of multiple projects that aggregates data from participating veterinary diagnostic laboratories (VDLs) in the United States of America, and reports the major findings to the swine industry (Figure 1).

||| CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'PRRSV', 'macroepidemiological', 'swine', 'swine industry macroepidemiological'
summary.name: SDRS
